General.Name: Iofina plc
General.Description: Iofina plc develops, explores for, and produces iodine and halogen-based specialty chemical derivatives in the United States and the United Kingdom. It offers halogen chemicals, disinfectants, electronic specialty gases, sanitizers, heat stabilizers, preservatives, and specialty intermediates, as well as animal health, mineral separation, and odor control products for use in electronics/semiconductor, pharmaceutical, food and beverage, personal care, paints and coatings, dairy, chemical intermediates, gemological, fish and wildlife, and nylon markets. Iofina plc was incorporated in 2005 and is based in London, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: 48 Chancery Lane, London, United Kingdom, WC2A 1JF
